question_text: Takes on challenging questions and provides instant answers.
Coaches others on their written communication skills
Addresses issues of key importance to stakeholders.
Communicates goals of project, resources required, resources available, etc. to the team
Articulates ideas and emotions clearly to others.
Gives clear and convincing presentations.
Adapts language and terminology to meet the needs of the audience.
Recaps action steps from meetings to ensure clarity and execution.
Considers the audience in how the communication is presented.
Responds in a timely manner, respecting deadlines and others' schedules.
When during status updates, I express ideas in a timely manner.
I persuade while maintaining attention rather than using jargon.
When in negotiation scenarios, I present data while maintaining attention.
I am skilled at facilitate conversations while maintaining attention.
I communicate using storytelling in a timely manner.
I am skilled at articulate thoughts with appropriate detail.
I find it easy to mediate discussions even when addressing conflicts.
When during status updates, I ask questions with empathy.
When in negotiation scenarios, I mediate discussions while maintaining attention.
I facilitate conversations using storytelling clearly and concisely.
I clarify misunderstandings with confidence rather than interrupting others.
I explain concepts non-technical audiences tactfully.
I find it easy to communicate even when addressing conflicts.
During team meetings, I present data with empathy.
I effectively ask questions when during performance reviews.
I can provide feedback diverse groups without missing important feedback.
I find it easy to listen even when handling objections.
I find it easy to articulate thoughts even when dealing with complex topics.
My crisis communication is culturally sensitive.
I provide feedback in meetings in a structured manner.
During brainstorming meetings, I clarify misunderstandings effectively.
I ask questions technical staff with confidence.
I mediate discussions in one-page summaries tactfully.
During all-hands meetings, I ask questions with appropriate detail.
I am skilled at listen proactively.
My nonverbal communication is logically organized.
My visual communication is clear and effective.
I find it easy to share information even when handling objections.
I am skilled at express ideas in a persuasive way.
I find it easy to persuade even when working with limited information.
I express ideas technical staff in a timely manner.
During brainstorming meetings, I listen without creating confusion.
I listen through visual aids with confidence.
My verbal communication is emotionally intelligent.
I can listen stakeholders without causing confusion.
When when explaining changes, I provide feedback proactively.
I can respond to concerns team members without creating resistance.
I mediate discussions using storytelling in a persuasive way.
My nonverbal communication is concise and impactful.
When during client presentations, I negotiate in a persuasive way.
